name: punchcards
description: Punchcard visualization using TypeScript and D3.js

scripts.clean-demo: trash sites/demo/*.js sites/demo/*.js.map !sites/demo/main-script.js sites/demo/*.css sites/demo/bootstrap-css sites/demo/fonts
scripts.clean: npm run clean-build & npm run clean-dist & npm run clean-sites
scripts.clean-sites: npm run clean-cover & npm run clean-demo & npm run clean-tsdoc
scripts.copy-sites-demo-deps: npm run copy-sites-demo-js && npm run copy-sites-demo-css && npm run copy-sites-demo-fonts
scripts.cover: npm run test && npm run remap-istanbul-json && npm run remap-istanbul-html
scripts.demo: npm run copy-sites-demo-deps && npm run dist
scripts.everything: npm run demo && npm run tsdoc && npm run cover
scripts.lint: npm run tslint && npm run jshint && npm run jslint && npm run csslint
scripts.postdemo: cp dist/punchcards.js dist/punchcards.js.map dist/punchcards.min.js dist/punchcards.min.js.map sites/demo/ && tsc --target es5 sites/demo/*.ts --outDir sites/demo
scripts.postdist: npm run exorcist && npm run uglify
scripts.precover: trash sites/coverage/ && npm run lint && npm run dist
scripts.predemo: npm run clean-demo && mkdirp sites/demo/fonts && mkdirp sites/demo/bootstrap-css
scripts.predist: trash build/ && mkdirp build && trash dist/ && mkdirp dist
scripts.pretest: npm run jshint && npm run jslint
scripts.purge: npm run clean & npm run clean-downloaded
scripts.uglify: uglifyjs dist/punchcards.js --output dist/punchcards.min.js --source-map dist/punchcards.min.js.map --screw-ie8 --in-source-map dist/punchcards.js.map --source-map-url punchcards.min.js.map

author: Johan Hidding, Mateusz Kuzak, Jurriaan H. Spaaks, Lourens Veen, Faruk Diblen
